segments.text: Take me to the airport , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( while driving ) Are you in a hurry ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to be there before 17 00 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll make it except a jam.You know it's rush hour .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's an extra ten in it for you if you can get me there on time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( After arriving on time ) Here's twenty dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . If you can't break it , keep the change . But can you give me a receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2
